author: Orlando Grimany Calas
description: The powerful and pervasive bittersweet notes of Allspice Dram heavily influence this cocktail which we'd recommend is enjoyed as an after-dinner "Dram".
name: Dram Queen
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
